name: B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo
description: Located in Sferracavallo in the Sicily region, with Lido di Sferracavallo and Barcarello Beach nearby, B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. Every unit features a private bathroom and bidet, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Guests at B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Palermo Cathedral is 13 km from the accommodation, while Fontana Pretoria is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino, 16 km from B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel del Centro
description: Hotel del Centro is located in the historic centre of Palermo, 150 metres from Palermo Central Train Station and the Bus Terminal to and from the airport. It features a free Wi-Fi internet point. The hotel is set in a historic building but offers modern guest rooms. Breakfast includes products from the local patisserie is served in the breakfast room. There is also a bar and a conference room. The Hotel del Centro is 1 km from both Palermo Cathedral and Teatro Massimo. The property is walking distance from the main sites that are part of the UNESCO World Heritage Convention.

name: Mondello Palace Hotel
address: Viale Principe di Scalea, 90151 Palermo, Sicily
description: Mondello Palace Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Mondello area. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Mondello Palace Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk, mini bar. Take a break from a long day and make use of private beach, outdoor pool, solarium, garden, water sports (non-motorized). For reliable service and professional staff, Mondello Palace Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: B&B Gallidoro Maqueda 124 st
description: Set 600 metres from Palermo Cathedral in Palermo, B&B Gallidoro features free WiFi access. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bike hire and car hire are available at this bed and breakfast and the area is popular for cycling. Palazzo dei Normanni is 1 km from B&B Gallidoro, while Via Maqueda is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino Airport, 24 km from B&B Gallidoro. On request, an airport shuttle service is provided.

name: Miramare
description: Hotel Miramare is set on the seafront just 5 minutes' drive from Catania Fontanarossa Airport. It has its own beach, a restaurant, and free on-site parking. All of the Miramare's rooms are air conditioned and come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi access is provided. The hotel restaurant serves Sicilian and Italian dishes. Breakfast is a sweet and savoury buffet, with local specialities and international favourites. You can reach the historic centre of Catania in 10 minutes by car.

name: B&b Stesicoro Inhabit - City Center
address: Via Etnea 123 (Ingresso Via Neve 7, Angolo Piazza Stesicoro 3 ), 95131 Catania, Sicily
description: Intimate and comfortable located in the heart of Catania in the elegant and prestigious via Etnea and a few meters from Piazza Duomo. Composed of seven finely furnished in modern style, all with private bathroom and perfectly soundproofed. The privileged location just a few meters from Piazza Duomo makes the B&B Stesicoro the perfect choice for those wishing to visit the city without using public transport, allowing you to walk to all the main points of interest in Catania.VRBO

name: Hotel Nettuno
address: Viale Ruggero di Lauria 121, 95126 Catania, Sicily
description: Set along Catania's promenade, Hotel Nettuno features an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with views of the sea furnished with deck chairs and parasols. Air-conditioned rooms at the Nettuno are equipped with free pay TV, free WiFi and a private bathroom. Some rooms come with a balcony overlooking the Ionian Sea or Mount Etna. During the day, guests can enjoy snacks, cocktails and long drinks in the Lounge Bar. Several restaurants, bars and pizzerias are located in the city centre, 1 km away. Hotel Nettuno located just 1.5 km from Le Ciminiere convention centre and Catania Train and Bus Station. Fontanarossa International Airport is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Villa del Bosco
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and antique interiors, Villa del Bosco is 3 km from Catania Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is an elegant 19th-century building that retains its original architecture and furniture. Rooms are spacious and comfortable and have period Sicilian furnishings. All air conditioned, rooms also feature free Wi-Fi, a minibar, and a TV. In the bathroom you will find a hairdryer. Breakfast is buffet style at Villa del Bosco and it served on the panoramic rooftop garden. Il Canile restaurant serves both Sicilian and international cuisine, specialising in fresh fish dishes and homemade cakes. In summer during weekdays, guests will enjoy free shuttle service and free access to one of the best private beaches in town, including a parasol and deck chair. The hotel's quiet location is ideal for escaping chaotic Catania. It has good bus links into the centre and is easily reached from the A18 motorway and Catania's ring road. A free shuttle from/to central Catania is available on request.

name: Villaggio Turistico Internazionale La Plaja
description: La Plaja offers a disco, and air-conditioned bungalows with free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV. Its private beach features ethnic-style decor and a rustic bar with woven palm leaves. Catania's centre is 3 km away. The bungalows overlook either the sea or the garden. They come with a fridge, and include an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer, toiletries and shower. Villaggio Turistico Internazionale La Plaja includes a restaurant-pizzeria, which serves Sicilian cuisine, a kiosk - street food bar on the beach, open only during the summer period. Surrounded by a 60,000 m² park, the residence is 5 minutes' drive from Fontanarossa Airport. The bus stop in front of La Plaja provides connection with Catania's centre.

name: Grand Hotel Baia Verde
description: The 4-star Grand Hotel Baia Verde is set on volcanic rocks overlooking a natural bay, on the road between Acicastello and Catania. It offers an outdoor pool and a free gym. Baia Verde is surrounded by a garden with palm and pine trees and a semi-Olympic pool. It has a sun terrace built into the rocks, which features a staircase leading down to the sea. All rooms at Baia Verde come with elegant Italian furniture, a 32-inch HD LED TV with Sky channels, and a minibar. Many rooms also have a view of the Ionian Sea. The Oleandro Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and traditional Sicilian and Mediterranean dishes at dinner. It has a wide selection of local wines and a sea-view terrace. The outdoor bar offers traditional Sicilian ice cream, snacks and drinks. The beauty centre is available for a variety of treatments and a free fitness centre is available for all guests.

name: Le Dune Sicily Hotel
description: Le Dune Sicily Hotel is only 2 km away from the city centre of Catania. It lies in an enchanting place between the golden sand of "de La Plaia" beach and a beautiful small Maritime pine forest. It perfectly fits into the landscape's colours with its Mediterranean style, set in this magnificent backdrop fully respecting the surrounding nature. Dune Sicily Hotel has a dining area for breakfast, a swimming pool, and surrounding garden.

name: NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi
address: Viale Kennedy Loc La Playa, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: The NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi hotel is located in La Playa on Sicily’s East Coast. It sits just across the road from the beach but at same time is only a short 10-minute drive from the Catania Fontanarossa Airport and 3km from Catania’s city center. There are 124 rooms at NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi. With their neutral color scheme and hardwood floors, the rooms are cozy spaces in which to relax. Guests can enjoy the glorious Sicilian weather on their private balcony. Each morning, the hotel serves up a huge breakfast which includes a variety of foods and beverages. You can enjoy lunch and dinner both indoors and out at the Pietro D’Aragona restaurant, which features an Italian and Mediterranean menu. You may also choose to kick back with a drink at our sophisticated bar, where a simple snack menu is available. Enjoy the best Sicily has to offer at the hotel’s stunning private beach where umbrellas and sunbeds are free for guests to use. Alternatively, head to our swimming pool and sunbathe on the terrace. We can host your events with space for up to 280 guests in our 5 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Romano Palace Luxury Hotel
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Catania Fontanarossa Airport, the Romano Palace Luxury Hotel offers a beach-front location and peaceful gardens. It features a gourmet restaurant, a large pool and elegant rooms. The Romano Palace’s rooms are decorated with bright Mediterranean colours and traditional furnishings. Each has free Wi-Fi, a balcony, and a LCD TV with satellite channels. The Coriandolo restaurant serves Sicilian and classic Italian flavours, such as fresh swordfish, shellfish with saffron spice, and traditional Cannolo dessert. Guests can enjoy breakfast, including luxurious prosecco and strawberries, on the roof terrace, with views of Mount Etna. Catania Cathedral and Catania Harbour are 4 km from Hotel Romano Palace. The A18 Autostrada motorway is a 10-minute drive away. Guests can explore the Romano’s 25 hectares of gardens, or relax by the Arabian fountain. The pool includes a hydromassage feature. Valet parking and a hotel porter are available for free.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: R&B Santa Nicolella
description: Set on the beachfront in Catania, R&B Santa Nicolella has a terrace and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Villa Bellini, Casa Museo di Giovanni Verga and Ursino Castle. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 300 metres from Catania Piazza Duomo. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hair dryer and a desk. All rooms have a kettle and a private bathroom, while some rooms also offer a balcony. At the guest house rooms come with a wardrobe and a TV. Guests at R&B Santa Nicolella will be able to enjoy activities in and around Catania, like cycling. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Catania Cathedral, Catania Amphitheatre and Roman Theatre of Catania. The nearest airport is Catania Fontanarossa Airport, 6 km from R&B Santa Nicolella.

name: Il Daviduccio
description: Located 600 metres from Catania Piazza Duomo, Il Daviduccio provides accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and room service for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property. Rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a hot tub. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Il Daviduccio features a terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roman Theatre of Catania, Casa di Verga and Ursino Castle. The nearest airport is Catania Fontanarossa Airport, 6 km from Il Daviduccio.

name: Seaside&City
description: Seaside&City provides accommodation in Catania, 3 km from Piazza Duomo. The property offers a shared kitchen, and luggage storage for guests. Each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At Seaside&City, the rooms include a seating area. An Italian breakfast is available every morning at the property. From June through September, free access for one guest to the affiliated beach resort and a special 20% discount on drinks and foods are offered (excluding packaged foods). Ciminiere Centro fieristico is 900 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Catania Fontanarossa Airport, 6 km from Seaside&City.
